mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( user_id, user_name, mobile, email, avatar, reg_ymdt, update_ymdt ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{regYmdt}, #{updateYmdt} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_no AS userNo, user_id AS userId, user_name AS userName, mobile AS mobile, email AS email, avatar AS avatar, reg_ymdt AS regYmdt, update_ymdt AS updateYmdt, delete_reserved_ymdt AS deleteReservedYmdt FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
